## Vector2.Add() method

Returns a new Vector2 as the result of the addition of the two given vectors.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static Add(vector1: ReadOnlyVector2, vector2: ReadOnlyVector2): Vector2;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  vector1 | <code>ReadOnlyVector2</code> | the first vector |
|  vector2 | <code>ReadOnlyVector2</code> | the second vector |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Vector2`

the resulting vector
